name: Only Good Tomatoes V0.1
description: Lore of the game: a man needs to collect tomatoes to make a salad, but he is blind, you must help him choose the red tomatoes and avoid the rotten ones.  Game: The game is very simple, they are tomatoes that appear from the right side of the screen that roll horizontally to the left side, all you have to do is click on the RED tomatoes, if you click on the rotten tomatoes three times YOU LOSE.
